CustomField.description: Enter a description about product category for this salesperson. Update 4/28/14: used in TerritoryManagement.cls to create test user records used in formula for Opportunity_name_suffix__c, which is in turn used to set opportunity name - an Inactive workflow Update 7/28/14: Used for reporting Note 12/16/15: Apparently also used in Lead:Owner_Product__c.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a description about product category for this salesperson. Used in report filtering. Enter: UNISTRUT UK UNISTRUT NZ UNISTRUT AU UNISTRUT TELESPAR STDPIPE MECHANICAL KAFTECH FENCE ELECTRICAL COPE BARBED TAPE AFC HERITAGE
CustomField.label: Salesperson Product Category
